name: io.github.Qiskit/qiskit-code-assistant-mcp-server
title: Qiskit Code Assistant MCP Server
description: MCP server for the Qiskit Code Assistant intelligent code completion

environmentVariables.name: QISKIT_IBM_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Your IBM Quantum API token for authentication

environmentVariables.name: QCA_TOOL_API_BASE
environmentVariables.description: Qiskit Code Assistant API base URL

environmentVariables.name: QCA_TOOL_MODEL_NAME
environmentVariables.description: Default model name for code completion
